DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike
-nE_pv-PznM.title: Diving 10 Stages Deep on Hazard 5! Biome Mastery Run | Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor

Drill Core Review Gameplay First Impression

Join the Drill Core Playtest and Wishlist here: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2821800/Drill_Core/

►DISCORD 
🎤Discord: https://www.discord.gg/67Nu6Aa22S
►TWITCH
📺Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/idle_cub

Want to Support me and the Channel?
🐻 JOIN & BECOME A MEMBER : http://bit.ly/4d7AhQ9
❤️ Super Thanks & Super Chats

Corporate greed meets strategic planet-mining in Drill Core! Drill to the heart of planets while managing workers, researching cutting-edge tech, and fortifying against alien attacks. Will you prioritize efficiency and risk your workers' safety, or focus on defense for survival?

Drill to the Core
Manage a team of miners, carriers, and guards through hazardous missions to extract minerals and power the drill platform. With indirect unit control, you have to plan your descent carefully and manage your resources wisely - every decision counts as you race against time to prevent climate collapse!

Deploy Your Defenses
Each night, aliens will attack the drill platform. Strategically fortify the drilling zone with turrets and upgrade your defenses to repel increasingly monstrous threats! Experiment with turret layouts to maximize their effectiveness, and incorporate new technologies you discover during the run.

Develop New Strategies
Every mission is unique with randomized monsters, restrictions, and technologies you will have at your disposal. Adapt swiftly and allocate your resources wisely. Successful missions unlock new mechanics and upgrades. Plan your approach carefully at the start of each mission and choose the right workers, buildings, and turrets for the job!

 #colonysim #strategygame  #indiegame
0m0hHdR_RgQ.title: Deep Rock Galactic Meets Dome Keeper And It's INCREDIBLE!! | Drill Core Playtest

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike
1RKVaJsxv2I.title: Huge New Patch Just Made The Game Even Better! | Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike

Download Drill Core on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2821800/Drill_Core/

Corporate greed meets strategic planet-mining in Drill Core! Drill to the heart of planets while managing workers, researching cutting-edge tech, and fortifying against alien attacks. Will you prioritize efficiency and risk your workers' safety, or focus on defense for survival?

Drill to the Core
Manage a team of miners, carriers, and guards through hazardous missions to extract minerals and power the drill platform. With indirect unit control, you have to plan your descent carefully and manage your resources wisely - every decision counts as you race against time to prevent climate collapse!

Deploy Your Defenses
Each night, aliens will attack the drill platform. Strategically fortify the drilling zone with turrets and upgrade your defenses to repel increasingly monstrous threats! Experiment with turret layouts to maximize their effectiveness, and incorporate new technologies you discover during the run.

Develop New Strategies
Every mission is unique with randomized monsters, restrictions, and technologies you will have at your disposal. Adapt swiftly and allocate your resources wisely. Successful missions unlock new mechanics and upgrades. Plan your approach carefully at the start of each mission and choose the right workers, buildings, and turrets for the job!

 #colonysim #strategygame  #towerdefense
53E9YQUJgPQ.title: We Finally Beat The Spider Boss in This Incredible Tower Defense!! | Drill Core

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike

Hell Survivors: Prologue is the demo version of Hell Survivors, a survival roguelite where countless hordes of demons rise from the abyss. Compose a multitude of mighty builds and eradicate waves of nightmare creatures. Will you be able to survive Hell?

About this game
Face an onslaught of demonic hordes and survive through inferno in Hell Survivors. Create powerful builds from a variety of heroes, weapons, and special abilities in order to survive for 20 minutes. Are you strong enough to come back from purgatory, or will you allow the nightmare creatures to consume you?

Features
Challenging runs of 10 minutes (main game will be 20 minutes)
Fast paced, skill based shooter mechanics
Dynamic build system with upgrade trees
Unlock new levels, heroes and weapons trough a meta progression system
Diverse bosses and elite enemies featuring unique mechanics and attack patterns
Stunning dark stylized art style
Thrilling post-metal adaptive soundtrack

Prologue Content
3 playable heroes
3 weapons
10 upgrade trees, featuring 4 upgrades each (total of 40 different upgrades)
5 enemies, including 1 elite and 1 boss

Many more content will be available in the main game.

 #actionroguelite #bulletheaven #diablo2

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike
8JDjgRzvJgU.title: 26 BEAMS + Insane Reload = Screenwide Insta Delete!! | Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike
CLByQOtcZkA.title: Mining Grenades Are Actually CRAZY Now! | Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor

Corporate greed meets strategic planet-mining in Drill Core! Drill to the heart of planets while managing workers, researching cutting-edge tech, and fortifying against alien attacks. Will you prioritize efficiency and risk your workers' safety, or focus on defense for survival?

Drill to the Core
Manage a team of miners, carriers, and guards through hazardous missions to extract minerals and power the drill platform. With indirect unit control, you have to plan your descent carefully and manage your resources wisely - every decision counts as you race against time to prevent climate collapse!

Deploy Your Defenses
Each night, aliens will attack the drill platform. Strategically fortify the drilling zone with turrets and upgrade your defenses to repel increasingly monstrous threats! Experiment with turret layouts to maximize their effectiveness, and incorporate new technologies you discover during the run.

Develop New Strategies
Every mission is unique with randomized monsters, restrictions, and technologies you will have at your disposal. Adapt swiftly and allocate your resources wisely. Successful missions unlock new mechanics and upgrades. Plan your approach carefully at the start of each mission and choose the right workers, buildings, and turrets for the job!

 #colonysim #strategygame  #indiegame

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike
FYNZAzPEWQY.title: TOP Tier Weapon Destroys Hazard 5 | Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor

Survivors of the Dawn is a run-based roguelite bullet heaven with strategic sci-fi weapon-item synergies against quintillions of alien hordes. Die and die MORE again to build synergies, level up bullets, unlock power-ups, and survive the chaos!

New character in the new biome... Take new critical weapon-item decisions that could spell victory or doom… All the challenges in this realm; hordes tail-slapping, throwing stuff, or even jumping at you? Oh boy, survival is far from guaranteed unless you beat the hazards of the Game Over challenges clenching and raining fire down over you!

HATCH WEAPON-ITEM SYNERGIES
Level up bullets, stack items, and synergize your way out of alien chaos at dawn. Create laser-sharp synergies and max out the auto-battler-inspired weapon classes for unexpected skills.

CLEAR SIGNALS AND UNLOCK SALVAGE PODS
Lead invader hordes into extinction within certain areas and at some, hang on a little more to unlock Salvage pods to earn extra gold, speed or items.

VISIT IN-MAP MARKETS AND DISTRESS CALLS
Shop mindfully and interact with the distress calls at random points in the middle of showdown to bag some more Reroll and Skip options, power-ups to your character, weapons or items full of risks and rewards.

 #actionroguelite #bulletheaven #survivorlike

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike

Download Graveyard Gunslingers Demo here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2462060/Graveyard_Gunslingers/

Shoot hordes of zombies in a bullet hell roguelite arena. By day, harvest resources, unlock map areas, and prepare for the upcoming night. Craft unique strategies by combining characters, weapons, and exploring a vast ability tree.

Prepared or not - night comes and you have to survive an increasingly growing hordes of zombies. Survive till the morning and you will have another day to live.

During daytime gather resources by chopping down wood or mining rocks. Bring resources to a campfire and use them to upgrade your skills.

It's up to you to manage and choose the best skills that fit your playstyle.

Play in a randomly generated map. Unlock bits of the map as days progress, collect gold, and explore the area. After successfully surviving all nights, your character will unlock their unique special ability. Once the character's ability is unlocked, you become much stronger, allowing you to tackle harder difficulties and receive better rewards.

Forget about complicated controls or hour-long cutscenes — jump right into action. It's a game that everyone will enjoy no matter if you are with a controller or keyboard. Gear up and blast your screen with bullets.

 #actionroguelite #bulletheaven #survivorlike
HhgOKZTwRh8.title: This INNOVATIVE Bullet Heaven Roguelike Just Keeps Getting Better! | Graveyard Gunslingers

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike

Gatekeeper is a fast-paced rogue-like. Go on a quest to find the stolen Heart of the Universe and shoot your way through the hordes of machine enemies guarding the planetary gates. Play solo or in 4 people co-op and become the next Guardian!

The Heart of the Universe has been stolen by powerful forces. You must head to an unknown galaxy, find the heart and reclaim it. But your mission isn’t that simple: the Heart was hidden in a quantum cage, the keys to which are kept by the ancient giants, the Sirens. Experience the unexpected thrills of this action rogue-like!

Choose your Hero
Several playable characters with unique abilities to suit your playstyle.
Limitless Skill Combinations

Gain experience to upgrade the characters’ skills, and utilize the abilities of found artifacts.
Team up with your friends

Invite your friends to take the role of a Universe defender and join you in this epic rogue-like adventure!
Unique Totems system

Complete all the challenges to defend the Totems and open the path to new locations!
Find and Obtain 100+ Collectibles

There are over a hundred different items and each of those collectibles changes the gameplay and makes every run a unique adventure.
Dozen of unique Planets, enemies and Bosses

Otherworldly and breathtaking locations with various enemies and bosses for you to explore, shoot and fight!

League of Legends Meets Vampire Survivors
Swarm is a bullet heaven, 1–4 player PvE game available within League of Legends that entirely re-imagines the core gameplay experience. Set in the Anima Squad universe, players team up to defend humanity and Final City from waves of alien Primordians while improving their firepower and gaining access to unique combat capabilities. Four different maps mark four increasingly long levels, with each one culminating in a boss fight of epic proportions that allows players to progress the story and various vanity tracks, as well as unlock new playable champions, called FIGHTERS for the purposes of the game.

Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

The entire underwater world will be hunting you. Find caves and dig tunnels to obtain valuable resources to upgrade your mech. Combine a vast array of weapons and create your unique build that will allow you to last as long as possible and unravel the mysteries of the ocean.

Explore the ocean floor and remnants of civilization on a huge robotic spider.
Find deep caves and drill tunnels in search of valuable resources and artifacts.
Upgrade mechanisms to survive in this aggressive environment as long as possible.
Fight off hordes of sea monsters with a vast arsenal of weapons.
Earn meta-currency for complete customization of your robotic spider.

Immerse yourself in a world where the depths of the ocean hide unknown wonders and dangers. A unique adventure awaits you in the exploration of the underwater world.

Travelling on the map
Experience a unique adventure in the underwater isometric world where hidden wonders and dangers await
You will travel across the boundless oceanic expanses and find the lost remnants of civilization.

Farm Resources
Go into forgotten caves and extract rare resources hidden in the darkest corners of the sea floor. As you collect treasures, you will upgrade your equipment and weapons to confront the threats lurking among the coral reefs and sinister underwater currents.

Replayability
Each new dive will reveal more secrets of the mysterious underwater kingdom, and encounters with sea monsters will test your bravery and survival skills.

Ocean Keeper adventure game is inspired by popular roguelike games, known for their unpredictability and challenge.

EACH time you explore the underwater worlds, the layout changes, making every journey unique.

This means you'll need to think on your feet and come up with new strategies for each dive, similar to classic games in this genre.

 #actionroguelite #bulletheaven #survivorlike

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike
R24fs4g5BSg.title: Legendary 5 Beams Mining Flame Turrets Run! | Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor

🐻 JOIN & BECOME A MEMBER : http://bit.ly/4d7AhQ9
❤️ Super Thanks & Super Chats

Embark on a thrilling journey in God of Weapons, an action roguelike where you must ascend the tower of Zhor to reclaim the last light for the world. To survive the monster onslaught on each tower's level, you'll need to obtain and carefully organize weapons and accessories in your inventory.

The world was once a bright and beautiful place, filled with light and wonder. But one day, an evil force swept across the land, stealing away the world's light and plunging it into darkness. As a result, chaos and destruction spread across the world, and many feared that the darkness would never end.

In this action roguelike, survive hordes of monsters on every level with automatic weapon attacks. Dodge and collect loot to improve your chances in the next round. It's all about strategy, reflexes, and smart movement.

Collecting weapons and accessories and strategically organizing them in your inventory is crucial to your survival. Your inventory space is limited, hence before putting in a new item, you'll need to consider its strengths and weaknesses and how it fits into your overall strategy.

Careful management of your inventory can make the difference between victory and defeat. As you progress through the game, you will amass an arsenal of powerful weapons and accessories, making you an unstoppable force to be reckoned with.

 #actionroguelike #bulletheaven #inventorymanagement
RveDH8hyw60.title: Excellent Bullet Heaven Action Roguelike With A Twist! | God of Weapons

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

Action roguelike horde shooter. Bullet heaven vs bullet hell. Enter The Astral and find powerful guns to slay demons by the thousands, take their power and get strong enough to defeat the Astral Kings.

An action roguelike top-down shooter. Bullet heaven vs bullet hell, man against demon hordes. Loot countless powerful guns to annihilate your foes by the thousands, and use the power of runes to get even stronger. Trapped in an infinite spanning astral plane filled with innumerable hordes of murderous demons stalking your every move - things clearly aren't looking great. But, at least The Gun is Good. Traverse strange dimensions, battle increasingly powerful and numerous foes in ever changing environments to try to find a way back home.

The demons are many, but The Gun is Good. Use your arsenal of powerful (to extremely powerful) guns to obliterate anything that stands in your path. Be it demon or solid wall. The demons hold runes - the currency of the astral.

Traverse maps of strange dimensions with different layouts and properties every time you play. Choose a safer path with lesser rewards or test your skills for greater boons. Enter both dangerous and safe areas to finally reach and challenge mighty demon lords.

Loot or purchase dozens of different guns with wildly varying properties, strengths, and weaknesses. Further enhanced with dozens of modifications that changes their power and abilities. The combinations are astronomical.
Discover different items that can be used to further help you on your journeys.

Runes have many different uses, use them to power up your character with dozens of different rune powers. Purchase items, guns and ammo. Find ways to craft modifications onto your guns to increase their power even further.

 #actionroguelike #bulletheaven #survivorlike
WKV9xJMHjRo.title: I Found The Best Horde Shooter Action Roguelike Demo | The Gun Is Good

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

Download Drill Core on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2821800/Drill_Core/

Corporate greed meets strategic planet-mining in Drill Core! Drill to the heart of planets while managing workers, researching cutting-edge tech, and fortifying against alien attacks. Will you prioritize efficiency and risk your workers' safety, or focus on defense for survival?

Drill to the Core
Manage a team of miners, carriers, and guards through hazardous missions to extract minerals and power the drill platform. With indirect unit control, you have to plan your descent carefully and manage your resources wisely - every decision counts as you race against time to prevent climate collapse!

Deploy Your Defenses
Each night, aliens will attack the drill platform. Strategically fortify the drilling zone with turrets and upgrade your defenses to repel increasingly monstrous threats! Experiment with turret layouts to maximize their effectiveness, and incorporate new technologies you discover during the run.

Develop New Strategies
Every mission is unique with randomized monsters, restrictions, and technologies you will have at your disposal. Adapt swiftly and allocate your resources wisely. Successful missions unlock new mechanics and upgrades. Plan your approach carefully at the start of each mission and choose the right workers, buildings, and turrets for the job!

 #colonysim #strategygame  #towerdefense
YdDMPPS9wfo.title: My Most Anticipated Tower Defense is Finally Here!! | Drill Core

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike
bIsZvV0cbtg.title: So Many Beams and Rockets on Hazard 5! Coilgun + Hurricane Mastery | Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor

Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

"Fight To The Death" is a roguelite game where you enter an arena filled with hundreds or even thousands of monsters. Utilizing each character's unique skills, collecting powerful items, crafting your own playstyle, and striving to be the last one standing.

Humanity has angered the gods by ravaging the Earth. Now, they are punished with a colossal arena of death, where all species must fight to survive. Faced with ferocious creatures, deadly traps, and a harsh environment, can humanity redeem their mistakes and prove their worth before the cold judgment of the gods?

Gameplay
Become a legendary warrior: Choose your preferred character class, each with unique skills and combat styles.
Face countless monsters: Battle against swarms of terrifying creatures in fierce encounters.
Make wise choices: Every decision you make impacts your strength and chances of survival. Choose your weapons, upgrade your skills, and make strategic choices.
Fight to survive: Only the most intelligent and courageous warriors can overcome this trial. Prove yourself and secure humanity's survival.

Features
Automated weapons and skills
A lot of playable characters
Stat strengthening system when leveled up
Face off countless of enemies from many directions
Get more item from equipment shop by killing enemies
Death is not the end; the power stones will help you become even stronger.
Flexible playstyle, with no limitations of weapon and skill combinations

 #actionroguelite #bulletheaven #brotato

The 420 69 Build

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike
gJ4c6ipl6KM.title: The Most Legendary Status Effect Run | Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor

🐻 JOIN & BECOME A MEMBER : http://bit.ly/4d7AhQ9
❤️ Super Thanks & Super Chats

Shoot hordes of zombies in a bullet hell roguelite arena. By day, harvest resources, unlock map areas, and prepare for the upcoming night. Craft unique strategies by combining characters, weapons, and exploring a vast ability tree.

Prepared or not - night comes and you have to survive an increasingly growing hordes of zombies. Survive till the morning and you will have another day to live.

During daytime gather resources by chopping down wood or mining rocks. Bring resources to a campfire and use them to upgrade your skills.

It's up to you to manage and choose the best skills that fit your playstyle.

Play in a randomly generated map. Unlock bits of the map as days progress, collect gold, and explore the area. After successfully surviving all nights, your character will unlock their unique special ability. Once the character's ability is unlocked, you become much stronger, allowing you to tackle harder difficulties and receive better rewards.

Forget about complicated controls or hour-long cutscenes — jump right into action. It's a game that everyone will enjoy no matter if you are with a controller or keyboard. Gear up and blast your screen with bullets.

 #actionroguelite #bulletheaven #survivorlike
hMT7lz0qWok.title: We Need More INNOVATIVE Bullet Heaven Roguelites Like This | Graveyard Gunslingers Demo

❤️ Super Thanks & Super Chats

Download Artisan TD Demo here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2224640/Artisan_TD/

Artisan TD is a Maze-type Tower Defense game where you have to survive by building mazes.

Join the Artisan’s Guild!
In Artisan TD, you'll set out to conquer the Archipelago of Chaos. Build tower mazes to free the souls of magical warriors corrupted by the TITANS.
Discover new towers and monsters as you embark on an adventure that will take you through 30 unique maps.

Created by a small independent team, handcrafted with passion and precision.
Artisan TD features no random, computer-generated waves.
Use the maps' topography and special tiles to optimize your maze.

Building strategies and combat tactics will be regularly updated. Vanquish the 4 primordial TITANS and their forty or so minions with a wide range of actions. You'll also unlock over 10 new towers that you can upgrade.
What's more, some maps will also have specific rule sets that you'll need to adapt to.

You'll be able to manage a small economy, taking the risk of integrating farms into your mazes.

 #towerdefense #mazebuilder #artisantd
iKst5_u-RbM.title: NEW Tower Defense Maze Builder Just Dropped! | Artisan TD

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike
ktk_QxXeGeE.title: We Finally Achieved the ABSOLUTE DREAM!! | Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor

Download Graveyard Gunslingers Demo here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2462060/Graveyard_Gunslingers/

Shoot hordes of zombies in a bullet hell roguelite arena. By day, harvest resources, unlock map areas, and prepare for the upcoming night. Craft unique strategies by combining characters, weapons, and exploring a vast ability tree.

Prepared or not - night comes and you have to survive an increasingly growing hordes of zombies. Survive till the morning and you will have another day to live.

During daytime gather resources by chopping down wood or mining rocks. Bring resources to a campfire and use them to upgrade your skills.

It's up to you to manage and choose the best skills that fit your playstyle.

Play in a randomly generated map. Unlock bits of the map as days progress, collect gold, and explore the area. After successfully surviving all nights, your character will unlock their unique special ability. Once the character's ability is unlocked, you become much stronger, allowing you to tackle harder difficulties and receive better rewards.

Forget about complicated controls or hour-long cutscenes — jump right into action. It's a game that everyone will enjoy no matter if you are with a controller or keyboard. Gear up and blast your screen with bullets.

 #actionroguelite #bulletheaven #survivorlike
l9LQDjx3Kw0.title: MAX Difficulty Conquered with NEW Mystic Upgrades! | Graveyard Gunslingers

Corn Tycoon is the ultimate farm adventure where you can grow, harvest, and sell delicious corn to become the richest farmer in town! Start by clicking on your fields to plant seeds, water them, and harvest corn. As you grow more crops, you can buy handy machines like seeders, irrigators, and harvesters to do the work faster. Don’t forget to upgrade your silos to store more corn and your water tanks to keep your fields nice and green. The more corn you grow, the more money you make! But that’s not all; Corn Tycoon is full of ways to boost your farm and earn even faster! Upgrade your trucks to transport more corn and sell it quicker at the market. Keep an eye on the sky for the flying piggy bank—click it as fast as you can to get a big money boost! As you harvest more and more corn, you’ll be able to prestige, restarting from scratch but unlocking much more expensive corn! Visit the lab to discover awesome upgrades that make your corn worth more, speed up your machines, and even help your soil grow crops quicker. Your farm becomes bigger, faster, and more profitable with every upgrade. Can you become the ultimate Corn Tycoon and grow the biggest corn empire ever? Get ready to click, plant, and harvest your way to farming fame. Let the corn adventure begin!

 #idler #incremental #clicker
lmJ85m3DvgU.title: Growing Corn to Make Millions! | Corn Tycoon

The Spell Brigade is an online co-op survivors-like for 1-4 players. Team up with your wizard friends to slay hordes of dark creatures. Complete team-based objectives, unlock new upgrades and create overpowered spell synergies. Friend nor foe is safe in this friendly fire bullet hell!

CO-OP FRIENDLY FIRE BULLET HELL
The Spell Brigade combines the survivors-like gameplay you love with good old multiplayer madness. Fight thousands of weird monsters together. Complete missions and upgrade spells together. Survive together!

WITH FRIENDS LIKE THESE…
Taking on entire armies is risky business. Assemble your Brigade and walk this mystical warpath together. Fighting as a team has many perks, but you will inevitably step on each other’s toes. But fear not! Even the most unfortunate, gruesome of deaths can be remedied through the power of sorcery and friendship!

BRIGADE OF SPELLS
Find, upgrade and combine your spells with powerful elements. Everything works together to ensure that no 2 builds are ever the same. Multiply this by the amount of wizards in your squad, and the potential for pure, unhinged chaos is endless!

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike
mNbFhelFhQ4.title: Making Over 1000 Gold in a Single Stage!! | Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike
oLSDIWm9B1c.title: Trying Infinite Bullets on the New Patch!! | Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor

Download Artisan TD Demo here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2224640/Artisan_TD/

Artisan TD is a Maze-type Tower Defense game where you have to survive by building mazes.

Join the Artisan’s Guild!
In Artisan TD, you'll set out to conquer the Archipelago of Chaos. Build tower mazes to free the souls of magical warriors corrupted by the TITANS.
Discover new towers and monsters as you embark on an adventure that will take you through 30 unique maps.

Created by a small independent team, handcrafted with passion and precision.
Artisan TD features no random, computer-generated waves.
Use the maps' topography and special tiles to optimize your maze.

Building strategies and combat tactics will be regularly updated. Vanquish the 4 primordial TITANS and their forty or so minions with a wide range of actions. You'll also unlock over 10 new towers that you can upgrade.
What's more, some maps will also have specific rule sets that you'll need to adapt to.

You'll be able to manage a small economy, taking the risk of integrating farms into your mazes.

 #towerdefense #mazebuilder #artisantd
oj7DhugYbVg.title: NEW Tower Defense Maze Builder With Stunning Aesthetics! | Artisan TD

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: SURVIVOR is a single player survivor-like auto-shooter. Wield the full arsenal of Deep Rock Galactic, take on hordes of lethal aliens, mine riches, and unlock powerful upgrades. It's one dwarf against all of Planet Hoxxes!

REVERSE BULLET HELL, WITH MINING
Kill bugs, upgrade your gear, and delve ever deeper into the lethal caves of Hoxxes. Collect and assemble a devastating array of guns, unleash hell upon wave after wave of alien monsters in fast and frenetic combat, and tunnel your way to collect precious riches from deep within the cave walls. Each mission is unique, using procedural cave generation and enemy waves, just as you've come to know from Deep Rock Galactic.

COMPLETE MISSION OBJECTIVES TO BECOME STRONGER
Delve deep, Miner! Once the Drop Pod releases you into the oppressive darkness, you are on your own. Complete the mission objectives set forth by the Company, and make it back to the Drop Pod in time to try your luck at even more deadly and lucrative encounters. Progress deeper and deeper into the planet while you grow ever stronger, survive all the way to the very end of your assignment, and finally get extracted alongside your hefty sack of loot.

DEEP ROCK, FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE
The universe of Deep Rock Galactic is loved by millions of players, and now you can experience it in a whole new single-player-focused way! Play each mission from a top-down perspective, navigating the caves of Hoxxes as you've never seen them before. Greybeard Deep Rock veterans will recognize much from Deep Rock Galactic, and if you are a recently joined Greenbeard: Welcome! We are thrilled to have you on board. You will like it here. Management demands it!

Initial release on early access includes:

4 classes
40 weapons
20 enemy types
3 biomes
A deep progression system of class mods, artifacts, and upgrades

The finished version will contain even more content, and other features - all to be determined as we receive and review feedback from the community during Early Access.

ROCK AND STONE!

#deeprockgalactic #bulletheaven #survivorlike
qR3-LpEvozY.title: NEW MASSIVE PATCH IS FINALLY HERE! | Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor
